Name: Chicken Coop
About the game: How hard it is for a cockerel to live in a chicken coop, only he knows. To keep all the chickens happy, you need to do more than just sweat. Every chicken dreams of chickens, have time to provide them all with eggs. Chicken Coop - Top Down View is a game where you have to beat eggs and provide yourself with offspring. Beat them in the right direction so that the chickens get their long-awaited eggs. Your work will be duly rewarded, happy chickens and lots of chickens. Game Features: - Logic Walkthrough -Pixel Art - Difficulty levels - Pleasant musical accompaniment
